CustomField.description: This is a formula field that stores today's date. The reason this has been implemented is for Conga Composer reasons. The Conga Server is in the US and the Salesforce instance is in AU. Therefore, both on different timezones. It is important that when displaying TODAY in Conga templates, it takes AU TODAY and not US TODAY and that is why we have created this field
